titles.title: Brokaw Act
Brokaw Act
A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to amend certain regulations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 115-406.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Brokaw Act
This bill directs the Securities and Exchange Commission to heighten disclosure requirements with respect to certain acquisitions of short interest in equity securities.
